sense.def:
Kadar človek ali žival
screeches
, se oglaša z neprijetnimi visokimi in glasnimi glasovi.

seg.quote: The parrots screeched in the trees.
‘You'll be sorry you did that!’ she screeched.
The parrot gave a loud screech.

sense.def:
Kadar vozeče vozilo
screeches
, z gumami povzroči neprijetne visoke zvoke.

seg.quote: The bus came screeching to a stop.
I heard a screech of tyres.
